title: ğŸ¤© FINALLY! Downloadable Content in MSFS 2024 Sim Update 3! ğŸ’¾ Less Streaming, More Flying!
description:
Huge news for the Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 community! Sim Update 3 has landed, and it brings a feature we've all been waiting for: the ability to download default aircraft, airports, and other essential content directly to your PC! Say goodbye to constant streaming and hello to potentially smoother performance and offline access. In this video, we'll take a first look at how this much-anticipated download functionality works in Sim Update 3. Asobo has truly delivered on a major community request! Let us know in the comments what content you'll be downloading first!
